attributes.action: agree to an immediate head to head election contest with Mr Andrew Backhouse, to determine who is the real peoples choice of Prime Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I truly beleive that the electorate of the UK are sick and tired of all the spin and retoric that eminates from Downing Street,and that it is time for a more grounded person to hold the elevated position of PM.
Someone who is in touch with the wish of the people, and someone who will deliver on the issues that matter to the public.When we hear "tough on crime, and the causes of crime"it makes you wonder what Tony really meant by that statement.It is high time that we tackled the root cause of crime and brought back sentences that were a real deterrent.
Investments in the health service have been raped to pay for executives to scrutinise their own failings, whilst patients with "non life threatening illness" are being discarded "until the next financial year" to try and balance the impossible financial situation.
Sick of the system? - then here's your chance to register your discord.
VOTE FOR CHANGE - VOTE BACKHOUSE.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
